title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants        There are currently no restaurants within the park as the Big Spring Lodge is undergoing renovations. However the local communities offer a wide variety of dining options from formal dining rooms to country diners. Check the Local Chambers of Commerce for dining suggestions.  The canoe rentals often have small stores where you can buy convenience foods. Why not get together a picnic on the riverbank?
